summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department, accepting an easement from Madison Estates Limited Partnership, a Washington Limited Partnership, for and in consideration of Mutual and Offsetting Benefits, for a watermain and appurtenances, over portions of Block 22, Lake Washington Shorelands, according to the official map on file in the Office of the Commissioner of Public Lands in Olympia, Washington, being in the City of Seattle, County of King, State of Washington.
